definition: race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once

sentences.english: Lastly, build the social environment of national equality and unity in the whole country.
sentences.chinese: 最後，國家範圍內民族平等團結氛圍的營造。

sentences.english: Win Tin said that he respected and valued the equality and self-determination of ethnic groups.
sentences.chinese: 溫丁說他尊重和珍視各民族平等和自決的原則。

sentences.english: First, adhere to the basic principles of national equality and national unity.
sentences.chinese: 第一，堅持民族平等和民族團結的基本原則。

sentences.english: National equality is the basic principle of Marxist national theories.
sentences.chinese: 民族平等是馬克思主義民族理論的基本原則。

sentences.english: The true meaning of Chinese nationalism is nation self-esteem and the equality of nationalities.
sentences.chinese: 中國民族主義的真諦是民族自尊與民族平等。

definition: Zhou Enlai's Five Principles of Peaceful Coexistence/1954 Panchsheel series of agreements between PRC and India
pinyin: he2 ping2 gong4 chu3 wu3 xiang4 yuan2 ze2

definition: democracy/civil liberties/principle of democracy, the second of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning widespread popular involvement in affairs of state)

pinyin: ren2 min2 min2 zhu3 zhuan1 zheng4

definition: Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People (late 1890s)
